title: Gangplank Ult Bug
body:
There is a bug on Gangplank which allows you to have 2 Cannon Barrages active at the same time.

How To:
1.Be in shop
2.Ult
3.Buy "Raise Morale" Ultimate upgrade
4.Ult again!

Actually a pretty big bug when you think about it and I haven't seen anyone report or talk about this bug so I'm happy to shed some light on it after I saw it used in a game on my level 20 acc.

replies.body:
Post this in 'Help & Support' or 'Report a Bug (NA)' to get a response.

https://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/f/ElA0rvVL

https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/bug-report
